Translations.Text: S Mass ik, ard a ten Nesteqsi akw
Ihi, emdee ayen i$ef i k ippunefk lameo, iixxeo i imcurak
Ih, a k Nqennaa mgal wid ittihin
i irran oebbi nniven, ar tama n Oebbi. Deqqal ad eoen
Ni$ Neeoa ar ul ik, kecc, iaaueo seg wayen qqaoen
Sbuccaa Mass ik s ccekoan. Ili seg wid ikennun
Aabed Mass ik, ar k id ias utebbet
Ad ias lameo n Oebbi, ur peirit $uoes. Gedha s yiS! Ay Aalay, sennig wayen pcaraken
Issrusu d lmalayek s ooue si lameo iS, $ef win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS: "Nedoet ar ur illi oebbi siwa Nek. Ihi, eezzbet iyI
Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Ay Aalay sennig wayen pcaraken
Ixelq ed amdan si tiqqit; atan iu$al aS, d axuim n uuee
Ixelq awen d lmal, segsen iceiiiven ieman, aba$uo, u, segsen, teppeppem
D ccbaea nnwen mara ten id terrem, u mara ten teksem
